name: Admob-for-flash
tagline: admob ane lib for flash iOS app and flash android app.it enable air application load native Advertising。show actionscript 3 load advertising
body:
### Welcome to admob for flash.
admob for flash is a free ane lib for flash developer.it enable flash mobile application load admob advertising. it is easy to use.

user can show all type of banner ad and full screen(interstitial advertising) ad of admob
user can show landscope and portrait advertising in actionscript 3 mobile application
user can set postion of ad

lib for android  can been download from 
http://code.google.com/p/flash-for-mobile/
### Requirements 
flash air sdk 3.5 or higher,

iPhone or iPad or android devices 


### mark
this lib do not work on pc and Simulator，but you can pack and debug on pc.and  show a  well on device

###download
http://flash-air-admob-ane-for-ios.googlecode.com/files/admob_ios_android_ane6.3.zip 

### useage
you can use this lib on pc and mac ,build for android or ios air application with flash bulder or flash cs or flash develop.just do like this
```
var admob:Admob=Admob.getInstance();
if (admob.isSupported)
{
	admob.createADView(AdSize.BANNER, "a1514bcdferve3437"); //create a banner ad view.this init the view 
	admob.addToStage(0, 0); // ad to displaylist position 0,0
	admob.load(false); // send a ad request.  
}
```
for android.  you need add in application-app.xml
<manifest android:installLocation="auto">
     <uses-sdk android:targetSdkVersion="11"/>
     <uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="8"/>
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE"/>
    <application>
  	 <activity android:name="com.google.ads.AdActivity" android:configChanges="keyboard|keyboardHidden|orientation|screenLayout|uiMode|screenSize|smallestScreenSize"/> 
    </application>
</manifest>
### useage  detail
```
more function
1. handler  ad event  like this.
admob.dispatcher.addEventListener(AdEvent.onReceiveAd,onAdEvent);
2. get ad size info
admob.getAdSize()
3.get screen size info
admob.getScreenSize()
4. get mac address or device id of device
admob.getMacAddress()


update:
1.include ios and android in one file
2.enable debug and pack on pc
3.base on admob6.3 no more use udid
4.enable get ad size info and screen size info
```
